patthana16.94:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ sauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.94:5.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ anuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.94:5.3: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … avigate cha.
